# 30YearWeather.com

## Description
30YearWeather provides accurate historical weather statistics and long-range forecasts based on 30 years of NASA POWER satellite data (1991-2021). We help travelers, wedding planners, and event organizers find the perfect date by analyzing historical weather patterns.

## Content Structure
- **City Overview**: `/{city-slug}` (e.g., /prague-cz, /rome-it) - General climate info, best time to visit.
- **Daily Forecast**: `/{city-slug}/{MM-DD}` (e.g., /rome-it/06-06) - Detailed historical stats for a specific day.
- **Monthly Overview**: `/{city-slug}/{MM}` (e.g., /rome-it/06) - Aggregated stats for a specific month.

## Data Source
All weather data is processed from the NASA POWER Project API, averaged over a 30-year period (1991-2021).
Metrics include:
- Temperature (Max/Min/Average)
- Precipitation Probability & Amount
- Wind Speed
- Cloud Cover & Sunshine Duration
